General.Name: Indara Insurance Public Company Limited
General.Description: Indara Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance services in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, personal accident, and other insurance products. The company was formerly known as Inter life Insurance Company Limited. Indara Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1949 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Indara Insurance Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Rod Dee Det Auto Company Limited.
General.Address: No. 364/29, Sri Ayuthaya Road, Bangkok, Thailand, 10400
